description: Detects activity as "net user administrator /domain" and "net group domain admins /domain"
name: Reconnaissance Activity
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4661" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:("SAM_USER" OR "SAM_GROUP") AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:S\-1\-5\-21\-* AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:"0x2d" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:(*\-500 OR *\-512))
author: Florian Roth (rule)
Jack Croock (method)
Jonhnathan Ribeiro (improvements)
oscd.community
